    Markdown conventions
  • #, ##, ###     -h1, h2, h3
  • ___ , ---, ***     -Horizontal Rules
  • >, >>, >>>     -Blockquotes
  • 1., 2., 3.     -Ordered list
  • +, -, *     -Unordered list
  • ![Image name](Insert URL)   -Add image
  • *italic*, _italic_
  • **bold**, __bold__
